trans-unit.source: This section shows how to send notifications from a .NET console app and any other.
trans-unit.target: This section shows how to send notifications from a .NET console app and any other.

trans-unit.source: If you are using Mobile Services please refer to the <link><linkText>Get Started with Push</linkText><title></title></link> tutorials.
trans-unit.target: If you are using Mobile Services please refer to the <link><linkText>Get Started with Push</linkText><title></title></link> tutorials.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use Java or PHP refer to <link><linkText>How to use Notification Hubs from Java/PHP</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use Java or PHP refer to <link><linkText>How to use Notification Hubs from Java/PHP</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You can send notifications from any backend using the <link><linkText>Notification Hub REST interface</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can send notifications from any backend using the <link><linkText>Notification Hub REST interface</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: The following code sends notifications to Windows Store, Windows Phone, iOS, and Android devices.
trans-unit.target: The following code sends notifications to Windows Store, Windows Phone, iOS, and Android devices.

trans-unit.source: Skip steps 1-3 if you created a console app when you completed <link><linkText>Get started with Notification Hubs[get-started]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Skip steps 1-3 if you created a console app when you completed <link><linkText>Get started with Notification Hubs[get-started]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio create a new Visual C# console application:
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio create a new Visual C# console application:

trans-unit.source: In the Visual Studio main menu, click Tools, Library Package Manager, and Package Manager Console, then in the console window type the following and press Enter:
trans-unit.target: In the Visual Studio main menu, click Tools, Library Package Manager, and Package Manager Console, then in the console window type the following and press Enter:

trans-unit.source: This adds a reference to the Azure Service Bus SDK by using the <html></html>WindowsAzure.ServiceBus NuGet package<html></html>.
trans-unit.target: This adds a reference to the Azure Service Bus SDK by using the <html></html>WindowsAzure.ServiceBus NuGet package<html></html>.

trans-unit.source: Open the file Program.cs and add the following using statement:
trans-unit.target: Open the file Program.cs and add the following using statement:

trans-unit.source: In the Program class, add the following method, or replace it if it already exists:
trans-unit.target: In the Program class, add the following method, or replace it if it already exists:

trans-unit.source: This code sends notifications for each of the six tags in the string array to Windows Store, Windows Phone and iOS devices.
trans-unit.target: This code sends notifications for each of the six tags in the string array to Windows Store, Windows Phone and iOS devices.

trans-unit.source: The use of tags makes sure that devices receive notifications only for the registered categories.
trans-unit.target: The use of tags makes sure that devices receive notifications only for the registered categories.

trans-unit.source: This backend code supports Windows Store, Windows Phone, iOS, and Android clients.
trans-unit.target: This backend code supports Windows Store, Windows Phone, iOS, and Android clients.

trans-unit.source: Send methods return an error response when the notification hub hasn't yet been configured for a particular client platform.
trans-unit.target: Send methods return an error response when the notification hub hasn't yet been configured for a particular client platform.

trans-unit.source: In the above code, replace the and placeholders with your notification hub name and the connection string for DefaultFullSharedAccessSignature that you obtained earlier.
trans-unit.target: In the above code, replace the and placeholders with your notification hub name and the connection string for DefaultFullSharedAccessSignature that you obtained earlier.
